detaileddescription.para: Class Collection A Collection resides inside a Cup and contains one or more Dice with same amount of sides that can be later rolled along with a modifier for the roll and a multiplier.
Cup A dice Cup holds and allows iteration of one ore more dice Collection
Class Dice A dice has two or more sides and can be roll
Class Notation A notation is used to encode and decode a Cup
Class Turn A turn is used to set and hold dice.
